name: Submerged (itch) (WiST Games)
description:
Submerged is a fast played game made for the 20 Second Game Jam, So yeah only takes 20 seconds to play, it's easy but not to easy ;)

GAME:

Get to the surface before your 20 seconds of oxygen runs out so you don't drown.

Hope you like it.. We will maybe continue working on it, in our spare time.

CONTROLS:

WASD - to control the diver.
